content: **knitted neck-warmer for children in drops air the piece is worked top down with rib sizes 2 12 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-044-bn yarn group c or a + a ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 years length approx 16-18-20-21 cm **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-50-50 g colour 21 sea blue needles for sizes 2 3/5 years drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm needles for sizes 2 10/12 years drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
